definition: plum blossom/clubs ♣ (a suit in card games)/wintersweet (dialect)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
Meihua Quan - "Plum Blossom Fist" (Chinese Martial Art)
(bird species of China) red avadavat (Amandava amandava)

sentences.english: While enjoying the beautiful plum blossom, people can also adopt them.
sentences.chinese: 今年市民在赏梅的同时还可以认养梅花。

sentences.english: Citizens may not only enjoy the beautiful plum blossom scenery in the garden, but also adopt them.
sentences.chinese: 今年市民在赏梅的同时还可以认养梅花。

sentences.english: But with plum blossoms it is a different sight.
sentences.chinese: 但有了梅花，那就是一种不同的景观。

sentences.english: The basic training methods of Meihuaquan are simple and strong yet relaxed and highly adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 梅花拳的训练过程简便严格，又随意自然。

sentences.english: The Club looks a little like a three-leaf clover design.
sentences.chinese: 例句梅花看上去有点像三叶草的图案。

sentences.english: Chinese plum flowers bloom in cold winters. ;
sentences.chinese: 梅花在严冷的冬天怒放。

sentences.english: Plum blossom or Quince blossom reminds us that new things can always grow.
sentences.chinese: 梅花或海棠花提醒我们新事物时刻在改变。

sentences.english: Bao Jianfeng from sharpening out, plum blossom from the bitter cold.
sentences.chinese: 宝剑锋从磨砺出，梅花喷鼻自苦寒来。

sentences.english: It is said that the music played by Huan was the famous Three Stanzas of Plum Blossoms.
sentences.chinese: 传说桓伊所奏的乐曲就是著名的‘梅花三弄’。

sentences.english: But in company with the plum blooms we feel greater.
sentences.chinese: 但在梅花的陪伴下我们觉得更棒。

sentences.english: In addition, the plum blossom is the earliest open flowers of every year.
sentences.chinese: 另外，梅花是每年最早开放的花类。

sentences.english: Although the plum flower, known as China's, but it is not publicity.
sentences.chinese: 虽然梅花被称为中国的国花，但是它并不张扬。

sentences.english: Below was a plum tree grove with branches in full flower.
sentences.chinese: 这是一片梅林，红白两种梅花开得正繁。

sentences.english: Cutaneous needle was used on the recessive side of spasm limbs of hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 梅花针轻扣偏瘫肢体痉挛劣势侧。

sentences.english: I have a twig of plum blossoms and their color is white and they are pure.
sentences.chinese: 我有一小枝的梅花，它的色白且净。

sentences.english: The "plum" jade is a kind of andesite with anamygdaloidal structure.
sentences.chinese: 河南汝阳梅花玉是一种杏仁状安山岩。

definition: variant of 臘梅|腊梅[la4 mei2]
Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
